caption: Robert Rauschenberg (1925–2008; born Port Arthur, TX; died Captiva Island, FL; active New York, NY, and Captiva Island), Printed by Styria Studio, Inc., Poster for the Benefit of Congressman John B. Brademas's Re-election, 1973. Color photo-silkscreen and applied masking tape on white wove paper; 71 x 51 cm. Gift of Herbert C. Schorr, Graduate School Class of 1963, and Mrs. Schorr (x1982-359)
